dashboard.label: Windows Threat Hunting
dashboard.description:
Failed Login Attempts → “Shows all login failures by user and host. Helps detect brute force attacks.”
Top Hosts with Failed Logins → “Highlights machines targeted most by failed login attempts.”
System/Application Errors → “Shows top system and application errors for monitoring unstable hosts.”
Top Processes / Events → “Highlights frequently executed processes or events for anomaly detection.”

search.query: source="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4625 | stats count by Account_Name, Workstation_Name, host, Failure_Reason | sort - count
source="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4625 | stats count by host | sort - count | head 10
source="WinEventLog:Application" OR source="WinEventLog:System" | stats count by EventCode, Message, host | sort - count | head 20
source="WinEventLog:Application" | stats count by Message, host | sort - count | head 20
